logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Started update covid case flow", payload: #[payload]

db:select.db:sql: select case_id, source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by from cvd_case_master where national_id=:national_id

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map(covidCase, indexOfCovidCase)-> { caseID: covidCase.case_id, source: covidCase.source, case_type: covidCase.case_type, first_name: covidCase.first_name, last_name: covidCase.last_name, phone: covidCase.phone, email: covidCase.email, date_of_birth: covidCase.national_id, national_id_type: covidCase.national_id_type, street_address: covidCase.street_address, city: covidCase.city, state: covidCase.state, postal: covidCase.postal, country: covidCase.country, create_date: covidCase.create_date, update_date: covidCase.update_date, create_by: covidCase.crete_by, update_by: covidCase.update_by }

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "code": 404, "message": "Resource not found", "description": error.description, "date-time": now()as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'"}, "x-transaction-id": vars.transactionId }
